title: Help please!
content:
I need help figuring out the fonts on this business card.

I'm more concerned about LYLY's than anything else.. If the other fonts are unidentifiable, I'm sure it's fine if I substitute them with something similar. Any and all help is greatly appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829190110/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_61.JPG) | 1.74 MB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
"LYLY'S": **[Cooper Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829190110/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=CooperBlack%20-%20Regular&fid=1ab609f29a7889864636a11c5b35a700&fsize=60&text=LYLY%20S&wrap=2)** by Oswald Bruce Cooper (1926) available from Adobe, Linotype, URW + others  
As for the rest text, I think can be set to **[Helvetica Black/Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829190110/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Helvetica%20-%20Black&fid=8ba25fee203a056d60f85e07f134e84a&fsize=24&text=RADIATORS%20AND%20MUFFLERS%20%20%20Service%20and%20Repair&wrap=2)** without noticeable difference
